text: FuthiabantubaMoseemvakwakhe(ngenkathiengekho) bakha ngezinto zabo zokuhloba okungumfanekiso wethole (isithixo ukuba basikhonze) sinomsindo, ngakube babengaboni yini ukuthi lalingakwazi ukukhuluma nabo futhi lalingabaholeli endleleni (eqondile) balithatha (ukuba balikhonze lokho) okwenza ukuba babeyizoni
